citations.narrative:
Two outdoor areas for dams with litters had a build up of feces. Daily spot cleaning hasn't been done for these two
outside areas although the indoor area was clean for all dogs. Surfaces that dogs contact need to be spot-cleaned daily
to prevent build-up of soiled areas and to reduce disease risk. Ensure that all areas that dogs contact are spot-cleaned
daily to prevent any build up of soiled material.
Correct by 6/10/2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Two outdoor areas for dams with litters had a build up of feces.  Daily spot cleaning hasn't been done for these two 
outside areas although the indoor area was clean for all dogs.  Surfaces that dogs contact need to be spot-cleaned daily 
to prevent build-up of soiled areas and to reduce disease risk.  Ensure that all areas that dogs contact are spot-cleaned 
daily to prevent any build up of soiled material. 
 
Correct by 6/10/2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
